author: Corinne Ramey
title: Nanny Murder Case Goes To Jury
text:
Did a Manhattan nanny intentionally murder her two young charges with a 13-inch kitchen knife, leaving their bodies in a bathtub, or impulsively stab them while in the throes of psychosis?
Lawyers presented their final arguments on both theories Monday as jurors prepared to deliberate in the trial of Yoselyn Ortega. On Oct. 25, 2012, Ms. Ortega, the former nanny, killed 6-year-old Lucia “Lulu” Krim and her brother, 2-year-old Leo, who lived in a luxury apartment building on Manhattan’s Upper West Side.
...
